page.title: 19Kelhead Quarry-2
page.content:
The quarry was opened in{August 1983 and it has taken 2 years to dig down to a depth of{30ft.}The maximum depth will be 50ft. The reason for not going deeper than 50ft is that once the limestone is extracted{the land has to {be filled in and returned to {agricultural use}and a deeper hole would require too much infill.
The quarry uses{nitrate based {explosives}packed into the rock and set off by electrically exploded detonators. The holes are filled with soil and rubble to stop rocks being thrown all over the quarry injuring workers and damaging machines.
The quarry uses{large machines}such as rock crushers and excavators. The
